issue.title: VisualPlugins not registering SDF elements (Gazebo2, Indigo) -> (Gazebo7, Kinetic)

content.raw:
Here's the relevant output when I launch Gazebo:
```
Warning [parser.cc:437] Converting a deprecated SDF source[data-string].
[ WARN] [1480704640.275955471]: GazeboRosVideo plugin missing <robotNamespace>, defaults to "".
[ WARN] [1480704640.275999205]: GazeboRosVideo Plugin (ns = ) missing <topicName>, defaults to "image_raw".
[ WARN] [1480704640.276010822]: GazeboRosVideo Plugin (ns = ) missing <height>, defaults to 240.
[ WARN] [1480704640.276020486]: GazeboRosVideo Plugin (ns = ) missing <width>, defaults to 320
```
